channel.title: What's New on TechBlog about OpenShift/Ansible/Satellite and much more

item.title: What's new in OpenShift, 4.20 Edition
item.description: This article covers news and updates in the OpenShift 4.20 release. We focus on points that got our attention, but this is not a complete summary of the release notes.
